_header: Sith in this world there can no thing be sure
_description: An exhortation against the Deadly Sins — ten stanzas rhyme royal

John Lydgate (added by later hand, ff. 275vb,
                    276rb)
CamTCC601.Attributed Title:
An Exortacion to auoyde and to put awey the seuyn dedely synnes (f.
                        275vb)
